results.title: [Medication of the month. Sitagliptin-metformin fixed combination (Janumet)].
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Sitagliptin_Phosphate_Metformin_Hydrochloride_Drug_Combination</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068899 @@@Janumet@@@ (50/850 mg or 50/1.000 mg), twice daily, is indicated in the treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes@@@ and is currently reimbursed in Belgium after failure of @CHEMICAL_Metformin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ monotherapy or the prior demonstration of the efficacy of adding sitaglitptin (Januvia) to @CHEMICAL_Metformin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

results.title: Sitagliptin/Metformin (janumet) as combination therapy in the treatment of type-2 diabetes mellitus.

results.title: Initial combination therapy with sitagliptin, a dipeptidyl peptidase-4 inhibitor, and metformin for patients with Type 2 diabetes mellitus.
results.text_hl: Recently, the US FDA approved initial combination therapy with @CHEMICAL_Sitagliptin_Phosphate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068900 @@@sitagliptin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Metformin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Sitagliptin_Phosphate_Metformin_Hydrochloride_Drug_Combination</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068899 @@@Janumet@@@ ) in order to help more @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@Type 2 diabetes mellitus@@@ get closer to accepted glycemic control targets, as recommended by standard guidelines.
